page.title: 17ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Periodically, discos are run for younger teenagers but there are no such facilities for the older teenager. The nearest disco/nightclub is about l0 miles away but only those with their own transport can make use of this. As a l9 year-old fortunate enough to have the use of a car, I usually spend my weekends out of Tenterden at discos, the cinema or at pubs in the local area. With a car, the beach is also easily accessible. If I was not able to drive, however, the local pub would be the only form of entertainment available.
